title: Kecara JustCocoa Hands & Body butter - Unscented

0.alt: Kecara JustCocoa Hands & Body butter - Unscented

1.alt: Kecara JustCocoa Hands & Body butter - Unscented

description.main_description: Kecara is a family-owned business named for three sisters -- Kelly, Carine, and Raissa -- who have formulated a range of natural skin and body care products featuring African shea and cocoa butter, ingredients they have known and loved since childhood in Côte d'Ivoire. Free from artificial ingredients, Kecara products nourish dry skin and protect it from cold weather in ways that petroleum derived products simply can not. And, very importantly, Kecara’s products are made using only fair trade ingredients sourced directly from West African organic farming cooperatives. Learn more about Kecara and the values that motivate their products at Kecara.com and https://www.instagram.com/kecaraboutique/Kecara’s JustCocoa Hands & Body butter is made with organic and fair trade ingredients -- cocoa butter, shea butter, coconut oil, and cold-pressed argan oil -- to instantly deliver deep moisture to your skin while it’s restorative abilities help repair, protect and nourish.Please note: this product is not nut-free as it contains shea butter.
description.Ingredients: organic butyrospermum parkii (shea butter/beurre de karite), organic theobroma cacao (cocoa butter/beurre de cacao), organic cocos nucifera (coconut oil), organic argania spinosa (argan oil/huile d'argan)
description.Directions: Use daily and as often as needed, on the hands, as a body moisturizer, or on problem areas such as dry feet, cracked heels, or small cuts and burns. Discontinue use if irritation occurrs.
description.Format: Each plastic jar contains 120 ml / 4 fl oz of product

description.main_description: Kecara is a family-owned business named for three sisters -- Kelly, Carine, and Raissa -- who have formulated a range of natural skin and body care products featuring African shea and cocoa butter, ingredients they have known and loved since childhood in Côte d'Ivoire. Free from artificial ingredients, Kecara products nourish dry skin and protect it from cold weather in ways that petroleum derived products simply can not. And, very importantly, Kecara’s products are made using only fair trade ingredients sourced directly from West African organic farming cooperatives. Learn more about Kecara and the values that motivate their products at Kecara.com and https://www.instagram.com/kecaraboutique/Kecara’s JustShea Hands & Body butter is an all natural moisturizing cream made with pure shea butter, organic coconut oil, and cold-pressed argan oil... all fair trade!

description.Directions: Use daily and as often as needed, on the hands, as a body moisturizer, or on problem areas such as dry feet, cracked heels, or small cuts and burns. Discontinue use if irritation occurrs.

title: Kecara JustCocoa No Scent Added Lip Balm (contains beeswax)

0.alt: Kecara JustCocoa No Scent Added Lip Balm (contains beeswax)

1.alt: Kecara JustCocoa No Scent Added Lip Balm (contains beeswax)

description.main_description: Kecara is a family-owned business named for three sisters -- Kelly, Carine, and Raissa -- who have formulated a range of natural skin and body care products featuring African shea and cocoa butter, ingredients they have known and loved since childhood in Côte d'Ivoire. Free from artificial ingredients, Kecara products nourish dry skin and protect it from cold weather in ways that petroleum derived products simply can not. And, very importantly, Kecara’s products are made using only fair trade ingredients sourced directly from West African organic farming cooperatives. Learn more about Kecara and the values that motivate their products at Kecara.com and https://www.instagram.com/kecaraboutique/Kecara’s JustCocoa Lip Balm is made from pure cocoa butter blended with beeswax and coconut oil. It instantly delivers moisture to your lips, while treating your senses to the sweet, naturally ocurring scent of cocoa (no natural or artificial scents or flavours added).
description.Ingredients: organic theobroma cacao (cocoa butter/beurre de cacao), organic cocos nucifera (coconut oil/huile de coco), cera alba (beeswax/cire d'abeille) -- no natural or artificial scents or flavours added.
description.Directions: Use as often as needed, on the lips and problem areas on the body such as itchy and dry spots or small cuts and burns. Discontinue use if irritation occurrs.
description.Format: Each tube contains 5 ml / 0.17 fl oz of lip balm

title: Just the Goods limited edition rosy pink summer bath salts

0.alt: Just the Goods limited edition rosy pink summer bath salts

1.alt: Just the Goods limited edition rosy pink summer bath salts

2.alt: Just the Goods limited edition rosy pink summer bath salts

description.main_description: Blended on Solsitce to capture the beauty of the season, this refreshing summer bath is designed to help cool the body and soothe the mind. Ingredient highlights: magnesium rich epsom salt relieves aching muscles,naturally antibacterial minerals in sea salt and himalayan pink salt help reduce incidences of summer sweat induced acne,hibiscus is cooling, anti-inflammatory, and rich in antioxidants; it's glowing pink colour is emotionally calming ,dehydrated pink grapefruit and pink grapefruit essential oil are fresh and uplifting, Each jar contains one tumbled rose quartz gemstone to open the heart and promote self-love and healing. This preservative-free product lasts longer when exposure to the elements (i.e. air, humidity, sunlight) is kept to a minimum. Please store in a cool, dark place and keep tightly sealed between uses.
description.Ingredients: magnesium sulphate (epsom salt), maris sel (sea salt), sodium chloride (himalayan pink salt), hibiscus rosa sinensis linn (hibiscus) petals, citrus grandis (pink grapefruit) fruit and peel, citrus grandis (pink grapefruit) peel oil
description.Directions: Add to a bath under running water as desired
description.Format: Each 8 oz jar is filled with 270 g of bath salts and one tumbled rose quartz gemstone.

title: Cheeks Ahoy Organic Cotton Mesh Bag (Bamboo + Cotton Facial Rounds sold separately)

0.alt: Cheeks Ahoy Organic Cotton Mesh Bag (Bamboo + Cotton Facial Rounds sold separately)

description.main_description: Green your daily facial routine by replacing disposable cotton balls and facial rounds. And, to ensure they don't get lost in the wash (as small things are prone to do), these organic mesh laundry bags are here to help!Cheeks Ahoy Organic Bamboo Facial Rounds -- sold separately -- are perfect for removing make-up, applying toner,  or washing and exfoliating your face. Once you've used them, wash and dry them with your towels and they're ready to use again. Find them here: https://justthegoods.net/products/cheeks-ahoy-organic-bamboo-cotton-facial-roundsHandmade in Peterborough Ontario by Cheeks Ahoy.
description.Format: Size 10 x 9". 100% organic cotton. Machine wash and dry. Shrinkage will occur after first wash. Bamboo + cotton rounds sold separately; pictured together for scale only.

title: The Green Beaver Company Foaming Hand Soap - Lavender

0.alt: The Green Beaver Company Foaming Hand Soap - Lavender

1.alt: The Green Beaver Company Foaming Hand Soap - Lavender

description.main_description: Just the Goods chooses to offer The Green Beaver Company's fomaing hand soap because it is plant-based, vegan, certified cruelty-free, labelled with ingredient transparency in mind, independently owned, affordable, gender inclusive, and makes no gimmicky claims. All products are ECOCERT Greenlife certified, certified vegan and cruelty-free by PETA, and The Green Beaver Company has taken Environmental Defence's Just Beautiful pledge.From The Green Beaver Company's website: The lavender you love with the rosemary you won't get enough of!  If you know Green Beaver, you must also know that we're big on lavender! That's because its calming and unique aroma turns a mundane task like washing your hands into a relaxing experience! Now with a hint of Rosemary to give it a distinct twist, and Labrador tea working hard to nourish and soften your skin, take the time to appreciate the little things as you go on about in your day!Available in 250 ml / 8.4 fl oz pump bottles -or- 770 ml / 26 fl oz refill bottles Sample sizes of this item are, unfortunately, not produced by the manufacturer, The Green Beaver Company. For hygienic reasons, please note that purchases of this item are considered final sale.
description.Ingredients: Aqua/Water/Eau, Aloe Vera, Coco Glucoside, Decyl Glucoside, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Glyceryl Oleate, Lavender Oil, Rosemary Oil*, Labrador Tea Extract*, Anthemis Nobilis (Chamomile) Flower Water, PCA Glyceryl Oleate, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Levulinate, Levulinic Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid*Ingredients from organic farming99% of the total ingredients are from natural origin10% of the total ingredients are from organic farmingNatural and Organic Cosmetics certified by ECOCERT Greenlife according to ECOCERT Standard available at http://cosmetics.ecocert.comFree from: Alcohol, Artifical Fragrance, Parabens, Phenoxyethanol, Phthalates or dyes, SLS or other Synthetic Detergents, Soy, TriclosanFor more information about each ingredient, please visit: https://greenbeaver.com/en/products/natural-soap/lavender-natural-foaming-hand-soap

title: petal, leaf, root. by Just the Goods facial cleaning gel for dry skin

0.alt: petal, leaf, root. by Just the Goods facial cleaning gel for dry skin

1.alt: petal, leaf, root. by Just the Goods facial cleaning gel for dry skin

description.main_description:
Responding to the needs of folks with chronically dry skin that tends toward sensitivity, or experiences stress from managing the impact of - for example - an arid climate, Just the Goods has developed a light cleansing gel that balances the need for both surface cleansing and moisutre retention.  And yes, sometimes and oil cleansing method just feels nice, too! This product can be used alone, or before the gentle exfoliation offered via petal, leaf, root. by Just the Goods' cleansing grains for dry skin. In either case, it is recommended that this product be followed with cleansing toner for best results. This light gel features the following ingredients: 
  • Organic, unrefined coconut oil -- while not recommended as a leave-on facial moisturizer -- contains a variety of medium-chain fatty acids with antibacterial and antifungal properties that help to break down sebum, dirt, and makeup on the surface of the skin without causing irritation. ,
  • Castor oil is a humectant rich in triglycerides to help skin retain moisture while also stimulating new tissue growth,
  • Jojoba oil is uniquely like our own skin's sebum, so it is remarkably effective at penetrating deeply to both deliver necessary moisture and control excess oil in every skin type. It also contains essential fatty acids such as omega-6 and -9, rich antioxidants, and nourishing vitamins A, D, and E, all of which combine to soothe, protect, and repair cellular damage.,
  • Geranium essential oil offering antiseptic, antifungal, and antibacterial properties help to normalize sebum secretion and prevent acne. As an anti-inflammatory, it promotes blood circulation ensuring best possible nourishment to cells, which contributes to hydration and minimizes incidences of eczema and rosacea. Rich in antioxidants, it promotes skin’s natural ability to ward off free radicals and harmful UV rays. It's gentle astringent effect helps to cleanse and tighten pores. ,
  • Bisabolol is the active compound in chamomile, which makes it anti-irritant, anti-inflammatory, and antimicrobial -- all beneficial for gentle cleansing while also soothing and softening dry and/or easily irritated skin., This product is also suitable for daily use by those with normal/sensitive skin and suitable for occassional use by those with oily skin.This cleanser can remove both mineral and petroleum-based makeup. For best results, remove product from face with a washcloth well saturated with warm water, then  -- as mentioned above -- follow with an appropriate toner applied with a cotton pad to reach into pores for a complete finish. Find JTG’s tips for daily skin care, including how to most effectively use toner, here: https://justthegoods.net/pages/tips-for-daily-skin-care.Each glass jar contains 100 g / 3.52 oz. This product contains ingredients considered safe for use during most pregnancies and nursing. Still, it is best to check with your health care providers first in case of any unique circumstances which may demonstrate otherwise. All petal, leaf, root. by Just the Goods products are… made with 100% certified organic plant and mineral-based ingredients ,vegan and certified cruelty-free by the Leaping Bunny Program ,free from artificial preservatives, colours, and/or fragrances ,free from gluten, GMOs, nuts, palm, petrochemicals, and soy,offered in glass bottles/jars and packed in boxes printed on post-consumer paper with plant-based inks using a waterless process, This product is handcrafted without the use of artificial preservatives and lasts longer when exposure to the elements (i.e. air, humidity, sunlight) is kept to a minimum. Please store in a cool, dark place and keep tightly sealed between uses for maximum longevity.NOTE: Not sure if this product is right for you? Try a sample first by selecting the smaller packaging option using the drop down menu
description.Ingredients: cocos nucifera (coconut) oil*, ricinus communis (castor) oil*, simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil*, pelargonium graveolens (geranium bourbon) oil*, matricaria chamomilla (german chamomile) oil*, eugenol•, geraniol•, linalool•, citronellol•*organic •component of essential oil huile de cocos nucifera (noix de coco)*, huile de ricinus communis (ricin)*, huile de graines de simmondsia chinensis (jojoba)*, huile de pélargonium graveolens (géranium bourbon)*, huile de matricaria camomilla (camomille allemande), eugénol•, géraniol•, linalol•, citronellol•* biologique• composant d'huile essentielle
description.Directions: Massage a small amount of product onto face in circular motions avoiding the eyes; rinse well with warm water and a washcloth; pat dry with a towel and follow with toner for best results. Store in a cool, dark place (i.e. a refrigerator will maintain firm texture if desired). Use within 8 months of opening.Masser une petite quantité de gel sur le visage en mouvements circulaires en évitant les yeux. Bien rincer avec de l'eau tiède et une débarbouillette, sécher en tapotant avec une serviette puis appliquer un tonique pour de meilleurs résultats. Ranger dans un endroit frais et sombre (un réfrigérateur maintiendra la texture ferme si désiré). Utiliser dans les 8 mois suivant l'ouverture.

title: petal, leaf, root. by Just the Goods facial toner for dry skin

0.alt: petal, leaf, root. by Just the Goods facial toner for dry skin

1.alt: petal, leaf, root. by Just the Goods facial toner for dry skin

description.main_description:
Pure and refreshing, petal, leaf, root. by Just the Goods’ toner for dry skin features the highest quality undiluted alcohol-free organic rose hydrosol produced using a steam distillation process blended with cleansing essential oil and aloe hydrosol to help skin retain moisture The anti-inflammatory properties of rose hydrosol replenish skin, helping it feel soft by reducing redness or swelling while its mild antibacterial action helps to cleanse and tone pores. Rose is also high in vitamin C, an antioxidant that helps prevent cellular damage,
  • Aloe is comprised of antioxidants, beneficial enzymes, vitamins A and C, and aloin making it antimicrobial and an effective anti-inflammatory that also promotes the production of hyaluronic acid, collagen, and elastin to help skin maintain elasticity and firmness. It’s humectant properties help skin retain moisture,
  • Rose geranium essential oil offers antiseptic, antifungal, and antibacterial properties help to normalize sebum secretion. As an anti-inflammatory, it promotes blood circulation ensuring best possible nourishment to cells, which contributes to hydration and reduced incidences of eczema and rosacea. Rich in antioxidants, it promotes skin’s natural ability to ward off free radicals and harmful UV rays. It's gentle astringent effect on skin helps cleanse and tighten pores. , Toner is best applied with a cotton pad after washing the face, or after use of a mask, to reach into pores for a complete finish. JTG’s tips for daily skin care, including how to most effectively use toner, can be found here: https://justthegoods.net/pages/tips-for-daily-skin-care.Each glass bottle contains 120 ml / 4.05 fl oz. This product ships in an HDPE bottle during winter months when freezing temperatures risk shattered glass. This product contains ingredients considered safe for use during most pregnancies and nursing. Still, it is best to check with your health care providers first in case of any unique circumstances which may demonstrate otherwise.All petal, leaf, root. by Just the Goods products are… made with 100% certified organic plant and mineral-based ingredients ,vegan and certified cruelty-free by the Leaping Bunny Program ,free from artificial preservatives, colours, and/or fragrances ,free from gluten, GMOs, nuts, palm, petrochemicals, and soy,offered in glass bottles/jars and packed in boxes printed on post-consumer paper with plant-based inks using a waterless process, This product is handcrafted without the use of artificial preservatives and lasts longer when exposure to the elements (i.e. air, humidity, sunlight) is kept to a minimum. Please store in a cool, dark place and keep tightly sealed between uses for maximum longevity.NOTE: Not sure if this product is right for you? Try a sample first by selecting the smaller packaging option using the drop down menu
description.Ingredients: rosa damascena flower distillate (rose water)*, aloe barbadensis (aloe) hydrosol water*, pelargonium roseum x asperum (rose geranium) oil*, citral•, eugenol•, geraniol•, linalool•, citronellol•* organic origin • component of essential oil distillat de fleur de rosa damascena (eau de rose)*, hydrolat d'aloe barbadensis (aloès)*, huile de pélargonium roseum x asperum (géranium rose)*, citral•, eugenol•, géraniol•, linalol•, citronellol•* biologique• composant d'huile essentielle
description.Directions: Shake well before use. Apply to a cotton disc, then wipe face in upward motions avoiding the eyes. Repeat as needed until no more oil/dirt from skin transfers to the cotton disc. Store in a cool, dark place. Bien agiter avant l'emploi. Appliquer sur un disque de coton, puis passer sur le visage en mouvements ascendants en évitant les yeux. Répéter au besoin jusqu'à ce qu'il n'y ait plus d'huile ou de saleté provenant de la peau sur le disque de coton. Garder à l'abri de la lumière et de la chaleur.
